channel.title: [Hyperion]Old school remake[UPDATE]
channel.description:
[img]http://img148.imageshack.us/img148/7742/osremake.png[/img]
Why are You Making It? Because jagex messed RuneScape up so bad, I want that great feeling back. The days of pking in edgeville, scared to lose your granite maul. Hehe:D
Whats Your Base? My base is Hyperion, By Graham, I've chosen this base because it's very stable, and since it's a rs remake it will have to handle lots of players doing lots of different actions.
What Is Unique about your server? This server will have every single detaill, Like Flax spinning for example. Normally no server would ever add such thing, But we do.
Your Experience? My Experience, I have been programming private servers for 3 years now. I've almost tried all different bases:P You know all the crap:P Delta, Allstar well you know what was cool back in the day:D But yeah Hyperion wins. Lol[/SPOILER]
[code]2 August 2010: Downloaded Hyperion 2 August 2010: Added Thieving, Stall base. 2 August 2010: Added basic combat system[as on hyperion you only hit 3s LOL. 2 August 2010: Added Teleporting 2 August 2010: Added Running 2 August 2010: Added differences between attack styles. 2 August 2010: Added banking by object. 2 August 2010: Posting this thread. 3 August 2010: Added Npc Spawning! 4 August 2010: Added Fishing!( currently fucked) 4 August 2010: Added Runecrafting! 4 August 2010: Added Agility! 5 august 2010: Added Herblore:) 5 august 2010: Added Skillguides! 6 august 2010: Added playerrights:) 6 August 2010: Added itemdropping. 6 August 2010: Added Food eating:) 6 August 2010: Fixed the login all skills to 0 thingy:) Easy fix:) 6 august 2010: Made basic firemaking:) 6 August 2010: Added PickPocketing. Kthxbai 6 August 2010: Added Energy Restoring. 6 August 2010: Made fully functional webclient:) No more unneeded Dc's:) 7 August 2010: Added bone Burying , Prayer skill is trainable. 26 August 2010: Added Fletching 26 August 2010: Added item dropping 26 August 2010: Loaded all item bonusses 26 August 2010: Made the combat system ready for use:) Melee based. 26 August 2010: Added prayer switching: Uploading gif now. Edit: Gif added. 26 August 2010: Added 100% pming:) 27 August 2010: Added Smelting:D 30 August 2010: Full old Runescape Website:) 31 August 2010: Added 377 Login screen:) 6 September 2010: Enabled Throttlefilter. 5 October 2010: Added flax picking. 10 October 2010: Finished Npc Dialogue 10 October 2010: Finished Gem Cutting. 17 October 2010: Flax Spinning. 18 October 2010: Fixed the teleporting gfx height n shit, gif added. 5 November 2010: Cow milking added. [/code]
Now for some pictures. [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/7-Y0Fcn.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/1-sG1kR.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/1-AxTbI.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/1-CfG8Z.png[/img] [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/1-ElHn0.png[/img] [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/3-XQdzs.png[/img] [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/4-HuNtD.png[/img] [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/5-U4HBi.png[/img] [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/6-fRBxg.png[/img] [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/7-maoHu.png[/img] [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/8-bnZDX.png[/img] [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/9-WgL5J.png[/img] [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/10-Pk7xj.png[/img] [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/1-oNKtV.png[/img] [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/2-ufzR1.png[/img] [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/3-RKIgf.png[/img] [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/4-qHyga.png[/img] [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/6-bIjMw.png[/img] [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/7-GL4UO.png[/img] [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/8-EBqKt.png[/img] [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/9-xEpoB.png[/img] [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/1-IIdtQ.png[/img] [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/2-zkqrg.png[/img] [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/3-RCMOU.png[/img] [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/4-ZyLZB.png[/img] [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/5-DTMmV.png[/img] [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/6-nZows.png[/img] [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/untitled-H5gIr.png[/img]
[img]http://i37.tinypic.com/xypl3.jpg[/img] [img]http://i38.tinypic.com/2vdo0mo.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/untitled-yMy11.gif[/img] [img]http://osremake.org/pictures/1.gif[/img]
Note, this is NOT a completed server, Nor you can pk on this atm. It's only for people who are interested in checking my progress.

[/quote]

Hyperion was made for 317’s originally, though it has been converted multiple times by people within the RSPS community to work with other clients.
